about_the_game:
Background Story

When the miners were digging underground, they accidentally opened some channels, inside which a continuous stream of monsters that would attack the precious energy crystals emerged. Fortunately, the miners have mastered a technique of using ore to synthesize defense towers. In order to resist the monster's attack, an adventure journey of mining and building defense towers begins!

Gameplay Features

1.The combination of mining and tower defense
You need to plant defense towers by mining and gathering minerals to resist monsters' attacks. I believe this innovative game mode that combines mining and tower defense can give you a different experience.
Mining:

Place defense towers to resist monsters:

2.Learn to utilize terrain
There are intricate underground channels, and by modifying these channels to create favorable terrain, you can pass the levels more smoothly!
3.Rich gameplay
This game includes 42 regular levels, 9 unique entertainment levels, 3 boss levels, and 3 endless mode levels.
In addition, you will gain various tools and talismans on your adventure journey, which will make you even stronger!
In short, the rich gameplay makes mining never boring!
Unknown Minesweeper Mode:

Powerful BOSS:


Hope you enjoy this indie game!

name: Miner Tower Defense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows9
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10, windows11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 180 MB available space

short_description: This is a game that combines mining and tower defense elements. Players need to build defense towers by digging and gathering minerals underground to resist a constant stream of monsters!
